column5: How many posts do I need before the classified section is unlocked?  Trying to reach Smailliefisher, I sent him an email.  Thanks,
As noted from the Classified Rules located at the top of the Classified sections.......  "New members will be unable to post until they have achieved a minimum post count of (20)."
Thank you, I didn't notice that.  I guess I'm now up to 4.
hey ratherb, what's your favourite colour?
lol
Thanks guys, how embarrassing...
No harm, no foul and your post count is going up.
all in good fun.
You can also PM the seller as well.
Tried that but have not heard back.  I wasn't sure if it went through.

Give Mercman you password and he can launch your post count into the thousands in a few days...  or.....you could post a thread introducing yourself...and thank everyone for the kind words individually then you should be good to go...
Right, left, down, down, up, right A+B unlocks the classifieds.

Go to your messenger page, click on that conversation and at the upper left of the page you'll see "participants". It'll tell you when you accessed the message last and when the one you sent it to accessed it. It'll say "not yet read" if he has not seen it.
Also try Kijiji because i think he is also posting his stuff there. look here
Thanks guys, I was never much of a gammer.  I needed the 'cheat keys'!  I sent him an email from the link within his member page.  Maybe he hasn't checked his email?
Maybe you overwhelmed him with your generous offer!
No offer, just wanted his contact info.  Although, from what he has listed maybe I shouldn't go see him, might cost me some $$.
Woo hoo....
lol....its all downhill from here....
BUMP  ID1
He's a chip off the ole block
Ok, he's there.  Who's organizing the car pool to his place.  I'll order ahead, Med. rare please.
